DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study obtain long-term ( 10+ yr ) clinical patient outcome data patient receive cruciate-retaining Foundation Knee system prior year 2000 .
DOC.criteria: Subject must receive cruciateretaining Foundation Knee system prior year 2000 . Surgery must primary knee replacement . Subject must receive one primary knee replacement per hospitalization Subject must primary diagnosis osteoarthritis operative knee . Subject able willing sign inform consent document Subject must previous knee implant ( unicondylar total joint replacement ) Subject mental condition may interfere subject 's ability give inform consent willingness fulfill study requirement ( i.e. , severe mental retardation Subject understand inform consent process , global dementia , prior stroke interfere Subject 's cognitive ability , senile dementia , Alzheimer 's Disease ) Subject prisoner
